title: I’m Weak to That Eye
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>Here, Karin-san! Your salt onigiri!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Ah, umm, I’m....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>You see, this rice comes from an excellent rice producer, and it’s really delicious! One of my relatives sent it all the way to me, but what I was surprised about was seeing it after it cooked.... Here, look. It’s so plump and shiny that it seems like it’s about to burst. Whenever you bite into it, you can just feel the sweetness of the rice spreading in your mouth~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>(I can’t say it.... I can’t say that I’m limiting my carbs intake....)<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>It’s really good rice, huh. Thanks for sharing with me, Hanayo-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Ehehe~. Since I heard that you’ve been limiting your calorie intake, I want to make sure that what little rice you could eat is the most delicious one, Karin-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>H-, Hanayo-chan....! Thank you, I’ll enjoy it to the fullest. *munch*........ Amazing, I never had rice with so much flavor before.... You don’t even need anything extra to go with this<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Right? The salt also enhances the taste of the rice.... Hnn~, delicious-!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Ah, Hanayo-chan. There’s some rice on your cheeks.... *munch*<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>K-, Karin-san.... If you do that, then I don’t know what taste the rice would have anymore....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
